title: Avondale! Walk to Great Spots!
map_address: 2900 N CENTRAL PARK 3 near 2900 N CENTRAL PARK 3
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Walk to Central Park Bar, Mother's Ruin, Sipping Turtle Cafe!
Also walking distance to Logan Square!
My wife and I love this place but it's time to go now that we need a bigger place for our growing pet family.
Our place is a 3 BR penthouse + office + huge attic for storage space.
1,000 sq foot huge place for a single person or couple or with your roommates!
If you are interested please email for showing!
